metadata.title: CVE-2020-11987 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache Batik 1.13 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused by improper input validation by the NodePickerPanel. By using a specially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests.

criterions.comment: batik package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
